media:group.media:title: Goodbye Overwatch
media:group.media:description:
I guess they finally did "Nerf this". They nerfed Overwatch completely. A farewell to a game that I used to know until greed completely destroyed it.

Support me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/powerpak
Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/JackWNicholls

Big thank you to Andrew Huntly for contributing and helping edit the script. In lieu of social media plugs, he asks you all to donate to Mermaids UK
https://mermaidsuk.org.uk/donate/
